rows.label: qst201317_msg0001
rows.name: Um... who is that boy?

rows.label: qst201317_msg0002
rows.name:
We found him being attacked by a
monster near Lake Varna, where your
daughter was supposedly headed.

rows.label: qst201317_msg0003
rows.name: Do you recognize him?

rows.label: qst201317_msg0004
rows.name: No... I don't know anyone from Luxuria.

rows.label: qst201317_msg0005
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst201317_msg0006
rows.name:
D'you think a similar incident
is happening in Luxuria, too?

rows.label: qst201317_msg0007
rows.name: That is a possibility.

rows.label: qst201317_msg0008
rows.name:
In that case, it would be more natural
to assume they were kidnapped by
someone, rather than spirited away.

rows.label: qst201317_msg0018
rows.name:
If that's true, was my
daughter also kidnapped and
taken to another country?

rows.label: qst201317_msg0009
rows.name: Most likely...

rows.label: qst201317_msg0010
rows.name: What could the culprit possibly want?

rows.label: qst201317_msg0011
rows.name: ...I have no idea.

rows.label: qst201317_msg0012
rows.name:
The only clue we have
right now is this boy.

rows.label: qst201317_msg0013
rows.name: Should we take him to Luxuria?

rows.label: qst201317_msg0014
rows.name:
Yes, let's try to find his
parents in Teos Aure.

rows.label: qst201317_msg0019
rows.name:
Are you taking me home, miss?
Will I get to see my mommy?

rows.label: qst201317_msg0020
rows.name: Yes... Let's find your mommy together.

rows.label: qst201317_msg0015
rows.name: Okay! Thank you!

rows.label: qst201317_msg0016
rows.name:
By investigating this boy,
we might find clues about
the other children.

rows.label: qst201317_msg0017
rows.name:
Dianna, could you please
wait a little longer?

rows.label: qst201317_msg0021
rows.name: Yes... I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst201317_msg0022
rows.name:
If this is an international
case, all I can do is trust
you all and wait...
